stc: A simple plugin to make someone say shutthecord, or any message you like!
stallmanvz: Lets you send the Stallman copypasta with a custom word in place of Linux.
multiclickvc: Allows you to set a custom amount of clicks / time between clicks to join a voicechannel.
avatariconviewer: Lets you view server icons and avatars in fullscreen via the context menu, or copy the link to them!
fancify: Fancify is a plugin that adds chat commands like þornify, clapify, bigtext (emojify), ßify.
emojiutil: Clone, save and copy emojis easily without bots.
quickimages: Quickly find images & videos in your prefered folder
wordnotifications: Get notifications when certain words are said.
plugininstaller: Allows you to install plugin directly from the #official-plugins or #unofficial-plugins channel.
customtimestamps: A Powercord plugin that displays custom timestamps on messages.
chmemacticons: Adds activity icons to the channel members list displaying the user's current primary activity.
spotifyindc: Control Spotify from within Discord, and includes some other features like getting the currently playing song's lyrics and album art.
openlinksindc: Lets you open links inside a Discord popup window by holding a key and clicking the link.
statuseverywhere: Adds status icons to all user avatars that are missing them, as well as typing and mobile indicators.
bringbackgamertext: Brings back the older 'gamer' texts that Discord used to use in various places around the app.
heyzere: Adds a command `heyzere` that continuously replaces all images in Discord with random images of Zerebos. This plugin is a nod at Powercord's Heygirl plugin.
copyrawmsg: Allows you to copy messages with their formatting still intact.
pcrolecoloreverywhere: Adds some colors to Discord's elements depending on roles.
pclettercount: A simple character counter plugin that displays above the channel chat area.
pccutecord: Cutecord reimplements Discord's notificationlogic so you can control who you get notifications from and when.
pcquickstar: Adds a star button to messages.
pclyrics: Lyrics plugin for Powercord, supports searching and the pc-spotify plugin!
pcbadgeseverywhere: Adds badges to other locations like messages or members list.
pcchanneltyping: Powercord plugin to add a typing indicator on channels where people are typing.
pcmultitask: Be more productive and have multiple windows to interact in multiple chats at the same time.
pcwpchanger: Changes your Discord background to a random image you configured every x seconds.
pcurban: Allows you to search on urban dictionary and send the result, locally or in the chat.
pcbetterfriends: Plugin that aims to improve Discord's friend feature.
linksflagger: Become aware of those 'sus' links with ease.
typingavatars: Shows the Avatars from that users that are currently typing.
noautoreplying: Defaults the reply toggle to '@ OFF' when replying to a message in Discord.
mentionutilities: Copy role mentions, channel mentions, and user mentions quickly.
silenttyping: Hides your typing indicator from others.
appnotifications: Adds notifications inside the Discord client itself.
pctextreact: Powercord plugin. Adds a command & button to react on message with regional indicators.
quickdelete: Quickly delete messages by holding ctrl and clicking.
grammarnazi: Automatic punctuation, capitalization, and word comparison with a custom dictionary.
rolecolors: Colors Discord according to user's role
userdetails: Shows you a lot informations about users in popouts.
crashrecover: Recovers from crashes if it's possible.
discordnamebadges: Some nice custom badges for next to usernames.
roleinfo: Right click on a role to see a resumed information of the role permissions
